div.p: Available skills are listed below and are deteremined by Harnworld professions and some additional properties associated with the setting. Situations which require rolls are announced by the GM with a general description of what needs to be resolved. Players will then argue, which skills could have a say in this and the GM will give a corresponding percentage of how much they apply.
For example, an assessemnt of the correct political relation between to rival noble families may be Herald/75% and Knight/50%, and Mercantyler/25%.

Now roll for all applicable skills you have a value in. (Remember that a base 0 always applies.) In the example above, the mrecantyler has a 1 in 4 chance of using with his skill, say 12, and a 3 in 4 chance of using his knight skill 0. All skills which are succeesses are added up through row 3 from the main rules (repeated here). The end result is skill to roll against.
